Opens the analysis section

create_brand()¶

Method to open brand creation window

import_brand()¶

Method to open brand import windows

brand_exit_call_back_method()¶

This method is triggered when there needs to be update in gui because of change in main_config.yaml file cases may be when importing yaml file, when updating parameters in the yaml

Use this function as a place holder for you method, so that your method gets invoked when the brand management exits

Usage¶

brand_exit_call_back_method = your_methods

set_camera_values_to_entry(exposure: float | int, gain: float | int, frame_rate: float | int, delay: float | int)¶
get_camera_values_to_entry() → list[float, float, float, float]¶

returns the values in the entry gui in camera parameters

Returns:

  • exposure (float)

  • gain (float)

  • frame_rate (float)

  • delay (float)

  • ———————————

  • Returns these vaule in a list in the following order.

captured_image_count(image_count: int = 0)¶

controller.gui_bindings module¶

class controller.gui_bindings.Controller(camera: MachineVisionCamera, live: LiveOperationFunction, debug: DebugOperationFunction, gui: PyQTWidgetFunction)¶

Bases: object

Controller class that inherits the Ui_MainWindow from the autogenerated pyqt ui file

Parameters:

  • camera (MachineVisionCamera) – instance of the MachineVisionCamera

  • gui (PyQTWidgetFunction) – instace of the current main window

controller.gui_operations module¶

Bases: Ui_MainWindow

switch_mode()¶

This method switch the live or debug mode

get_current_mode() → str¶

returns the current mode of the gui: Live or Debug

Returns:

mode – returns string either Debug or Live

Return type:

str
